title: Riot didn't give me Bronze 5
body:
So i'm just playing ranked casually, trying not to feed and throw but also be a tryhard (bc that's stressful!).
Is there anything that i could learn from B5 and are my stats not worthy of B5?
Anyways, to any rioters reading, I believe I deserve bronze 5 and would like swift action overnight in the form of a triple division demotion. TY

replies.body: add ATREOATLAS he is happy to help you
